医学新闻来自News -Medical.net-世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-gb
研究探讨了为什么新生儿比成年人更好地再生心组织患有心脏并发症的新生儿可以依靠其新开发的免疫系统来再生心脏组织，但成年人并不是那么幸运。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250211/study-explores-why-newborns-newborns-newborns-regenter-hent-tissue-better-better-than-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250211/study-explores-why-newborns-newborns-newborns-newborn-hent-tissue-better-better-than-adults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=752A85EA-1FA4-46FE-BB3B-11B-11B441CDD67D Tue, 11 Feb 2025 14:07:27 -0500 Study explores why newborns regenerate heart tissue better than adults
许多美国人接受补充剂以进行免疫支持，但医生的建议很低研究发现，美国有11％的成年人使用饮食补充剂进行免疫支持，强调了医疗保健专业建议的重要性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250211/many-americans-take-supplements-for-mmmune-suplort-support-but-doctor-recmendations-row.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250211/many-americans-take-supplements-for-mmmune-suplort-support-but-doctor-recmendations-row.ase-low.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=113235B0-4606-4822-AE5B-58A7D51F1798 Tue, 11 Feb 2025 12:56:00 -0500 Many Americans take supplements for immune support, but doctor recommendations are low
创新的脑肿瘤模型为个性化的癌症治疗提供了希望来自德国癌症研究中心（DKFZ）和上海大学的科学家开发了一种创新方法，用于在实验室中生长单个患者的脑肿瘤，以尽可能地模仿父母肿瘤的原始结构和分子特性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250211/innovative-brain-brain-tumor-model-finders-hope-for-for-per-per-per-per-per-per-per-per-per-per-per-per-per-per-per-per-por-per-per-for-for-for-cancer-treatments.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250211/innovative-brain-brain-tumor-model-modelers-hope-for-for-persallized-cancer-treatments.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4bd20432-CD35-4ED4-968D-AE76520A0C5D Tue, 11 Feb 2025 12:44:53 -0500 Innovative brain tumor model offers hope for personalized cancer treatments
社交隔离期间的体育活动可改善老年人的睡眠质量一份新的研究论文于2025年1月15日在《衰老》（老化）中发表，第17卷，第1期，标题为“在Covid-19大流行期间的社会隔离中体育锻炼实践与睡眠质量之间的关联后期的指南和未来研究：系统评价。” https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250211/physical-activity-improves-sleep-sleep-quality-inderer-inder-inder-inder-inder-derder-distring-during-social-isolation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250211/physical-activity-improves-sleep-sleep-quality-in grop--i-in-inder-inder-inder-Adults-During-Social-isolation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=41837552-4D99-4FA8-820E-5F22E9420B1E Tue, 11 Feb 2025 12:33:12 -0500 Physical activity improves sleep quality in older adults during social isolation
肺信号触发癌症患者的血凝块形成响应于癌症患者肺的信号（如前所述）的信号形成的血液凝块，这是Weill Cornell医学，纪念Sloan Kettering癌症中心和加利福尼亚州圣地亚哥大学健康的临床前研究。凝块是患有晚期疾病或侵袭性肿瘤的癌症患者中死亡的第二大原因。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250211/lung-signals-trigger-blood-clot-formation-formation-in-cancer-patients.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250211/lung-signals-trigger-blood-clot-formation-incancer-incancer-patients.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=45486760-29A9-4488B323-66A8888D7106A5 Tue, 11 Feb 2025 12:25:47 -0500 Lung signals trigger blood clot formation in cancer patients
研究发现，糖尿病药物可能有助于降低COPD爆发风险该研究表明，SGLT-2I与2型糖尿病中的COPD恶化较少有关，这表明需要进行进一步的临床试验以确认这些发现。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250211/diabetes-medications-may-help-lower-copd-flare-copd-flare-risk----------------------------- https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250211/diabetes-medications-may-help-lower-copd-flare-copd-flare-risk------------------------finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1A338185-053E-4138-8411-1E0CB20944406 Tue, 11 Feb 2025 12:22:00 -0500 Diabetes medications may help lower COPD flare-up risk, study finds
研究探讨了微生物组的重新启动以延长克罗恩病治疗的影响一种特殊的液体饮食，被称为独家肠内营养，是克罗恩病的重要疗法。患者仅消耗此配方六到八周，完全避免了固体食品。但是，以前尚不清楚这有用的确切原因。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250211/study-explores-microbiome-reboot-reboot-to-prolong-to-prolong-effect-crohns-disease-disease-disease-therapy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250211/study-explores-microbiome-reboot-reboot-to-prolong-to-prolong-effect-crohns-disease-disease-disease-therapy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=708F316E-3D55-4B40-AE43-D9E646F11225 Tue, 11 Feb 2025 12:10:55 -0500 Study explores microbiome reboot to prolong effect of Crohn's disease therapy

研究将高花粉暴露与老年人的死亡率提高联系起来随着气候变化加剧了全国各地的花粉季节，密歇根大学的新研究表明，在呼吸问题的老年人中，花粉暴露与死亡率之间存在联系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250211/research-links-high-pollen-pollen-pollen-posure-to-to-increard-to-increard-to-increard-deph-inder-inder-inder-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250211/research-links-high-pollen-pollen-pollen-posure-to to-increard-to-increard-deph-rates-inder-inder-adults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=71f2a6ff-44E0-4E93-A5B0-338888AF70879A Tue, 11 Feb 2025 11:36:23 -0500 Research links high pollen exposure to increased death rates in older adults
